subject: United States Politics and Government
Steroids
Jury System
Perjury
Doping (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Whereas Barry Bonds was accused of perjury before a grand jury, Roger Clemens is charged with lying to Congress, and legal experts disagree on the potential effect.
snippet: Whereas Barry Bonds was accused of perjury before a grand jury, Roger Clemens is charged with lying to Congress, and legal experts disagree on the potential effect.
